page.title: 07Chemicals used on Farms.
page.content: We went to visit the place where they sell supplies to farmers.We found lots of chemicals being used, for instance weed killers are sprayed onto crops because farmers can't afford to pay workers to weed their fields.We are worried about the long term effects of chemicals that get sprayed onto the crops. The use of chemicals has grown much more widespread during the last 20 years. When they sow wheat or barley or swedes, they spray on some Fungicide to stop mildew. Then later on they put on some Fertilizer - (nitrogen) which makes it grow quicker and stronger. Then they put on some Â£Â£Pre Harvest '' Chemical, it kills the weeds again.
